items.title: Pick slip
items.description: Pick slip representation of item, request and requester

item.description: Pick slip representation of an item

title.description: Primary title (or label) associated with an item

barcode.description: Unique inventory control number for physical resources, used largely for circulation purposes

status.description: Name of the status of an item

primaryContributor.description: Primary contributor from an instance record

allContributors.description: List of contributors from an instance record, separated by semicolon

enumeration.description: Descriptive information for the numbering scheme of a serial

volume.description: Volume is intended for monographs when a multipart monograph (e.g. a biography of George Bernard Shaw in three volumes)

chronology.description: Descriptive information for the dating scheme of a serial

yearCaption.description: In multipart monographs, a caption is a character(s) used to label a level of chronology, e.g., year 1985. A list of captions separated by semicolon.

copy.description: Copy number from item or holding record. The piece identifier, which reflects if the library has a copy of a single-volume monograph; one copy of a multi-volume, (e.g. Copy 1, or C.7.).

numberOfPieces.description: Used when an item is checked out or returned to verify that all parts are present (e.g. 7 CDs in a set)

effectiveLocationSpecific.description: Name of the (shelf) location of the item

effectiveLocationInstitution.description: First-level location unit, which location belongs to

effectiveLocationCampus.description: Second-level location unit, which location belongs to

effectiveLocationLibrary.description: Third-level location unit, which location belongs to

callNumber.description: Effective call number, an identifier assigned to the item or its holding

callNumberPrefix.description: The prefix of the effective call number, an identifier assigned to the item or its holding

callNumberSuffix.description: The suffix of the effective call number, an identifier assigned to the item or its holding

request.description: Pick slip representation of a request

servicePointPickup.description: Name of the requested pick-up service point

holdShelfExpirationDate.description: Date when an item returned to the hold shelf expires

reasonForCancellation.description: Name of the reason for request cancellation

deliveryAddressType.description: Name of the delivery address type

requester.description: Pick slip representation of the requester (user)

barcode.description: Personal identifier assigned to the requester by the library

addressLine1.description: Address Line 1 of the requested delivery address

addressLine2.description: Address Line 2 of the requested delivery address

city.description: City of the requested delivery address

region.description: Region of the requested delivery address

postalCode.description: Postal Code of the requested delivery address

countryId.description: Country code of the requested delivery address
